org.trianacode.taskgraph.event

Interface TaskGraphListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TaskGraphChecker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationFrame, ControlLoopChecker, ForShowMonitor, LoopPanel, MainTriana, MapPanel, ParameterPanelManager, TaskGraphCheckerImp

    public interface TaskGraphListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive taskgraph events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cableConnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
      Called when a new connection is made between two tasks.
      void cableDisconnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
      Called before a connection between two tasks is removed.
      void cableReconnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
      Called when a connection is reconnected to a different task.
      void controlTaskStateChanged(ControlTaskStateEvent event)
      Called when the control task is connected/disconnected or unstable
      void taskCreated(TaskGraphTaskEvent event)
      Called when a new task is created in a taskgraph.
      void taskRemoved(TaskGraphTaskEvent event)
      Called when a task is removed from a taskgraph.

    • Method Detail

      • taskCreated

        void taskCreated(TaskGraphTaskEvent event)
        Called when a new task is created in a taskgraph.

      • taskRemoved

        void taskRemoved(TaskGraphTaskEvent event)
        Called when a task is removed from a taskgraph. Note that this method is called when tasks are removed from a taskgraph due to being grouped (they are placed in the new groups taskgraph).

      • cableConnected

        void cableConnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
        Called when a new connection is made between two tasks.

      • cableReconnected

        void cableReconnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
        Called when a connection is reconnected to a different task.

      • cableDisconnected

        void cableDisconnected(TaskGraphCableEvent event)
        Called before a connection between two tasks is removed.

      • controlTaskStateChanged

        void controlTaskStateChanged(ControlTaskStateEvent event)
        Called when the control task is connected/disconnected or unstable
